settings.heading: Allergen Statement
settings.content:
____________________

While we strive to keep a sterile environment, we cannot guarantee that guests with allergies or serious food sensitivities (especially to nuts or seeds) may not be exposed to cross contamination. As such, please understand that Karma Baker cannot be responsible for any injury, loss or damage claimed by any guest with food allergies who consumes our food, regardless of circumstances.

settings.heading: Care Instructions
settings.content:
We ship our cakes frozen via Fedex Standard Overnight service. (the cost is bult into the cake price.)

Your cake should arrive by 8pm on your chosen delivery date.

Check to be sure your cake looks good and refridgerate upon delivery. Your cake may be still frozen or just cold. It may be frozen again to serve later or kept in the fridge to defrost. For bithday cakes (cake and frosting) leave your cake out 4-6 hours to come to room temperature before cutting and eating. Our birthday cakes are best eaten at room temperature.

Cream cakes (like banana cream or tiramisu) should be defrosted overnight in the frdige and pullled out about 30 minutes before eating. These shoud be served cool.

All cakes may be refridgerated for a week or re-frozen for longer life.

settings.heading: Shipping Details
settings.content: Cakes are shipped free with Fedex Overnight. The price is inlcuded in the cake. It will be send FedEx Standard Overnight for no additional cost to arrive by 8pm. Cakes are shipped separately from other items. Please choose a delivery date at least 1 day before you plan to eat it.

settings.title: Quick Shipping
settings.text:
Cakes & pies ship FedEx Overnight for free. And separately from other items.

All other items ship by FedEx 2-day service starting at $16.95 flat for the first item. $5 for each additional 5lbs after that.

Please choose your delivery date 1 day before you plan to eat!

settings.title: How to Store & Eat
settings.text:
Our layered birthday-style cakes are best eaten at room temperature. It makes them soft and gooey and delicious. Allow them to sit ot 4-6 hours at room temperature before eating.

Pastry cream cakes & cheesecakes should be kept in the fridge and eaten cool. They may come out for up to an hour before eating.

Store items in the fridge for about 7 days. Or you can freeze everything for longer life.
